name: machine_type
description: type of machines employed to perform inferences

name: min_replica_count
description: minimum number of machine instances to be kept constantly

name: max_replica_count
description: maximum number of machine instances to be launched

name: accelerator
description: type of GPU machine if one should be used to acclerate inference

name: model_monitoring
description: if Vertex AI Model Monitoring is enabled for this endpoint

name: mointoring_type
description: type of problems to be detected via montiring: trainin-serving-skew or prediction-drift

name: alert_threshold
description: threshold for Model Monitoring to determine when to raise an alert
